entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation, mentioned as 'I' and 'me'. He is discussing a situation with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend, also present in the conversation. He is skeptical of Harry's claim.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as having a similar tone to Ron's skepticism.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a character who has a friend named Viollet.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as allowing Harry to enter something (likely the tournament) and giving him prize money.

entities.name: viollet
entities.description: Viollet is a friend of the Fat Lady's who has already told Ron and others about Dumbledore's decision.

entities.name: galleons
entities.description: Galleons are mentioned as prize money.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron have an argument about Harry's claim.
Cedric has a similar tone to Ron's skepticism, implying Cedric might also be skeptical of Harry's claim.
Ron is skeptical of Harry's claim.
Dumbledore allows Harry to enter something and gives him prize money.
Viollet is a friend of the Fat Lady's.
Harry receives Galleons as prize money.
